name: Aeon Mall BSD City
address: BSD City, Jl. BSD Raya Utama, Pagedangan, Tangerang, Banten 15345, Indonesia
about: Aeon Mall BSD City is a modern shopping center located in the BSD City area of Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia. The mall has a building area of approximately 92,000 square meters and offers a variety of products and services, including fashion, electronics, culinary, entertainment, and daily necessities. The mall is also equipped with a cinema, game arena, fitness center, and supermarket. In addition, Aeon Mall BSD City also has a spacious parking area to accommodate thousands of vehicles. The mall is very popular among local residents and tourists due to its strategic location and complete facilities.

name: The Breeze
address: BSD Green Office Park, Jl. Grand Boulevard, BSD City, Tangerang, Banten 15345, Indonesia
about: The Breeze is a lifestyle center located in the BSD City area of Tangerang, Banten, Indonesia. The center offers a variety of lifestyle-related products and services, including fashion, dining, entertainment, and wellness. It has a modern and open-air design, with a focus on sustainability and greenery. The center also features a spacious outdoor area with a lake, jogging track, and children's playground, making it a popular destination for families and outdoor enthusiasts.
